  • Uses of Truck in components

    Subclasses of Truck in components
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  NonStandardTruck
    Represents a vehicle for transferring packages from the sorting center to branches and back
    Carry only NonStandardPackage
    Only one package per trip.
    class  StandardTruck
    Represents a vehicle that used for delivering small packages and standard packages Transfer many packages per trip. Collects only SmallPackage and StandardPackage. Got a weight limit.
    class  Van
    Represents a vehicle that used for delivering small packages and standard packages Transfer only one package per trip. Collects only SmallPackage and StandardPackage.
